verification.completion_summary: The research findings confirm that an initial review of foundational literature, definitions, and core principles related to AI agents, prompt engineering, and engineering standards has been conducted, addressing the objective to ensure comprehensive understanding.

covered_aspects: Review of foundational literature on AI agents, reasoning, and self-improvement
Understanding of core concepts and definitions
Strategies for model adaptation, prompt engineering, and workflow standards
Insights into team building and collaboration in AI projects
Application of engineering principles such as TDD and robustness
